Lynn Paul King (November 28, 1907 – May 11, 1972) was a Major League Baseball player from  to  and in . King was born in Villisca, Iowa and died in Atlantic, Iowa. King attended Drake University in Des Moines, Iowa, where he letter in football, basketball, and baseball. He was the starting quarterback for the Drake Bulldogs from 1928 to 1930 and captain of the 1930 Drake Bulldogs football team.
